nodes.text: Galaxy Tiles is an expansion for the Star Wars Miniatures roleplaying game. This expansion, featuring hard stock map tiles for custom use, was released on January 15, 2008. The tiles have several types of terrain for use in the game.

All tiles are squared 25mm × 25mm to simulate indoor floor and to use with the Star Wars Miniatures. The tiles are double sided for versatility; mostly one side is an empty floor tile, while the other side is printed with, for instance, a chasm, crates, stairs, a bridge or a TIE fighter.
